scripts.compile: node task/compile && echo Compile Complete. && exit 0
scripts.build: node task/build RELEASE=min USE_POLYFILL=false DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_KEYED=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_CALLBACKS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:light: node task/build RELEASE=light USE_POLYFILL=false DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=false SUPPORT_STORAGE=false SUPPORT_HELPERS=false SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=false SUPPORT_ASYNC=false SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=false SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=false SUPPORT_REACTIVE=false SUPPORT_KEYED=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_CALLBACKS=false SUPPORT_COMPILE=false && exit 0
scripts.build:es5: node task/build RELEASE=es5 USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_KEYED=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_CALLBACKS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:debug: node task/build RELEASE=debug USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=true SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_KEYED=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_CALLBACKS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:pre: node task/build RELEASE=pre USE_POLYFILL=true DEBUG=false SUPPORT_CACHE=true SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_CACHE_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=true SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=true SUPPORT_TEMPLATE_EXTENSION=true SUPPORT_REACTIVE=true SUPPORT_KEYED=true SUPPORT_POOLS=true SUPPORT_CALLBACKS=true SUPPORT_COMPILE=true && exit 0
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:light && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:pre && npm run build:debug && npm run build:module
scripts.update: npm install google-closure-compiler@nightly && npm install babel-cli@latest && npm install babel-plugin-conditional-compile@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-constant-folding@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-dead-code-elimination@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-flip-comparisons@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-guarded-expressions@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-infinity@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-mangle-names@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-replace@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-simplify@latest && npm install babel-plugin-minify-type-constructors@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-member-expression-literals@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-merge-sibling-variables@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-minify-booleans@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-property-literals@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-simplify-comparison-operators@latest && npm install babel-plugin-transform-undefined-to-void@latest
scripts.test: npm run build:pre && npm run build:light && cd test && npm install && npx mikado-compile template.html -f && npx mikado-compile proxy.html -f && npx mikado-compile keyed.html -f && npm run test
